name: GirlsCraft: Creative Edition
description:
The game Girls Craft: Creative Edition unleashes your imagination for the realization all the ideas and creative construction, a set of interior will create comfort and atmosphere, whether it is home or beauty salon, or shop with cool clothes, it's up to you!

It's simple: run and create your own world from a variety of beautiful cubes and harvested items: flowers, painting, kitchen, a bedroom, a desk with a computer and many more.

- Unique character selection.
- Completely free game for kids and adults.
- New inhabitants: from superheroes with superabilities to cute princesses.
- Mobile edition includes new maps and biome - desert with canyons.
